text.0: a mighty governor art thou wondrous destroyer of the foe.
text.1: whose friend is never done to death and never never overcome.
text.2: lord of the clan who brings us bliss strong warrior slayer of the fiend.
text.3: may india somadrinker go before us bull who gives us peace.
text.4: drive rākṣasas and foes away break thou in pieces vṛtrasjaws.
text.5: o vṛtraslaying indra quell the foemans wrath who threatens us.
text.6: o indra beat our foes away humble the men who challenge us.
text.7: send down to nether darkness him who seeks to do us injury.
text.8: baffle the foemans plan ward off his weapon who would conquer us.
text.9: give shelter from his furious wrath and keep his murdering dart afar.
